name: PNC Business Credit
overview: PNC Business Credit provides asset-based lending services. It offers financing solutions to support working capital, restructurings, recapitalizations, turnarounds, management buyouts, mergers and acquisitions, and leveraged buyouts. The company also offers over advance term loans and second-lien loans for additional liquidity. PNC Business Credit was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in New York, New York with additional offices in Los Angeles and San Francisco. PNC Business Credit operates as a subsidiary of The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc.
